roleset.name: cover with sod
roleset.note: SOD-V NOTES: Automatically created based on framefiles: feather (9.9). Hand-corrected by Claire. Member of VNcls butter-9.9. (from sod.01-v)

role.descr: Sod itself, what kind of sod

example.name: Typical transitive, no sod mentioned
example.text: When he sodded the lawn, even the policeman who lived on the hill came down to watch and stayed to help.

example.name: Passive descriptive usage
example.text: [The yard]-1 was sodded *-1 with St. Augustine grass and there were a couple of existing trees.
